SETTINGS_ACCOUNTS_MESSAGE_OTHER_MAILS: You can redirect incoming mail from your other mailboxes to your inbox on Mail.cz To do this, configure connections to your mailboxes on servers that support POP3 or IMAP
CONNECTED_SUCCESS_COLLECTION_OF_MAILS: The connection is established. Mail collection will begin in a few minutes
SETTINGS_ACCESS_OK: Allow access to your mailbox using email clients
WITH_PROTOCOL_IMAP: With imap.mail.cz by IMAP server protocol
WITH_PROTOCOL_POP3: From the server pop.mail.cz via the POP3 protocol
INPUT_PLACEHOLDER_NAME_RULE: Specify the name of the rule
RULE_ADD_MESSAGE_WHEN_ACTIVE_RULE: When you activate the rules for forwarding letters, you will need to enter a password
RULE_ADD_MESSAGE_DONOT_NOT_APPLY_RULE: Do not apply the rest of the rules
RULE_ADD_MESSAGE_VIEW_LIST_RULES_2: which will be displayed in the list of rules
RULES_MESSAGE_IS_HELP_RULES_WE: With rules, you can decompose incoming mail into folders, forward letters to another address, receive notifications of new messages, set up an answering machine and even delete some emails on receipt
RULES_MESSAGE_IS_HELP_RULES_WE_CREATE: You can create a rule to
RULES_MESSAGE_IS_HELP_RULES_WE_MOVE: move letters to a separate folder
RULES_MESSAGE_IS_HELP_RULES_WE_SELECTED: mark letters with a specific label
RULES_IF_WHOM_OR_COPY: If "To whom or a copy" coincide with
RULES_WE_MANAGE_MAILS: In addition, you can manage incoming mail using black and white lists
